briefTitle: A Study of ALKS 5461 for the Treatment of Major Depressive Disorder (MDD) - FORWARD-5 Study
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Efficacy and Safety Study of ALKS 5461 for the Adjunctive Treatment of Major Depressive Disorder (the FORWARD-5 Study)
summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of ALKS 5461.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Montgomery Asberg Depression Rating Scale (MADRS)-6 Score Using Average of Changes From Baseline to Week 3 Through the End of Treatment Period (Week 5 for Stage 1, Week 6 for Stage 2)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline and 5 weeks (Stage 1) and baseline and 6 weeks (Stage 2), combined together for the overall estimate of treatment effect

pValues.comp: OG000 vs OG002 vs OG003 vs OG005
